title: Eba and Okra Stew
instructions: A set of instructions for Eba and Okra Stew
ingredients: A set of ingredients for Eba and Okra Stew
about: The Eba part is super fast food, but can be heavy, only the strong can stay awake after a decent helping of Eba. Can be eaten with a variety of stews, but we'll talk about Okra for this choice.
strapline: Really, really quick to make but a bit heavy.
